weeklyTopNews.title: Older Australians volunteering for next step in COVID-19 vaccine trials
weeklyTopNews.summary: The trial is being conducted by clinical research company Linear at the Queen Elizabeth II Medical Centre in Perth. The vaccine is manufactured by Clover Biopharmaceuticals.

weeklyTopNews.title: Victoria's roadmap for easing coronavirus lockdown restrictions: what you need to know
weeklyTopNews.summary: Melbourne's stage 4 restrictions have been extended for 2 weeks, and the state government has released a 'roadmap' for Victoria's easing of coronavirus restrictions.

weeklyTopNews.title: Victoria records another 59 coronavirus deaths and 81 new cases
weeklyTopNews.summary: The deaths revealed on Friday include 50 people in aged care that passed away during July and August. Of the nine new deaths reported, 8 were linked to aged care outbreaks.

weeklyTopNews.title: Senate censures Aged Care Minister Richard Colbeck over handling of coronavirus crisis
weeklyTopNews.summary: The Senate has decided to censure Aged Care Minister Roger Colbeck for his failure to take resposiblity for the coronavirus outbreaks across the sector.

weeklyTopNews.title: NSW records 17 new coronavirus cases, only one in hotel quarantine
weeklyTopNews.summary: 15 of the 17 new recorded cases are linked to known clusters. One case is in hotel quarantine and the source for the other is unknown.

weeklyTopNews.title: Sydney CBD coronavirus cluster grows to 41 as NSW creates travel bubble along Victoria border
weeklyTopNews.summary: New South Wales recorded 13 new cases overnight. A cluster at a gym in Sydney has now been linked to 41 cases.
